name: Leap of Fright
description:
Guide Brave Bunny through the Fearsome Forest. Keep their sanity up or suffer the consequences! 

Submission to the BTP game jam

I uploaded a browser version here https://glas.itch.io/leap-of-fright-browser, although it is not part of the jam.

Controls (also stated in the game)

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move and Jump

L - Lessen Vision                R - Go back to Checkpoint

*Doing lots of things at once overwhelm Brave Bunny. For your guidance, their inner thoughts are displayed at the top center of the screen.

Theme (Less is More) Implementation

The less Brave Bunny moves or sees, the more sane(or calm) they become.

Feel free to comment any questions, suggestions, emojis, etc. 

Art was made by @amamakeart. Everything else was made by glas. Software used are Unity, lmms, audacity and photopea.
